attributes.action: MAKE IT LAW TO EXECUTE ANYBODY CONVICTED OF TERRORISM OR TREASON.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In this country we still have a law written in the statute books that anybody who commits an act of treason i.e terrorism can lawfully and legally be executed. Therefore anybody who plans/plots terrorism should fall into this category. Terrorism is ideological. How can a prison sentence in todays 5***** hotels courtesy of HM and the taxpayer, reform these fundementalists. They carn't!.

The system at the moment doesn't work!.

But execution annilates the glorification of terrorism,therefore eliminating promotion to many 'Wannabe' terrorists. This of course will dilute extremism.

BRING BACK HANGING!!!!.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
